name: Other Side (stefanarctic)
description:
Game made for Ben Bonk Game Jam #3

I made this game in a couple of hours(I was gone when the jam started)

You must pick the box and put it in the slot(the red thing) in the other room to gain a point. Also, an enemy is there just to kill you.. Not only he can't see and is only attracted to sound, but he is slow and dumb so you got some advantage my friend.

Score UI doesn't work right now(will try to fix after the voting ends) but if your score is 10 you should get a movement speed increase.

Controls:

Left arrow, Right arrow - move left and right

Up arrow - jump

F - drop the box

This was very rushed and it was only my third game jam, so please don't hate.

Anyway, have fun!
